name: journy.io Customer Data Platform
author: journy.io

sections.description:
About journy.io

Empower your marketing, sales and support teams with actionable customer insights, in order to improve conversions, increase sales, and reduce churn, right within the tools they already use.

Start with creating an account on journy.io

Creating an account on journy.io is free and easy.

This plugin allows you to track page visits as well as Contact Form 7 or Elementor Pro form submissions in journy.io. journy.io will inform you which pages, ads, blog posts, marketing channels and campaigns and events most contribute to achieving your website goal. E.g. sign-up or check-out. The interface is nice-looking and easy to use and understand. Signing up with journy.io is free!

Give it a couple of visitors and buyers, and you’ll quickly find out which pages, channels, ad campaigns and others internal/external events most contribute to having your next visitors sign up or buy.

Features of journy.io

  • Quick to set up
  • Simply insert the API key
  • Supports Elementor Pro and Contact Forms 7
  • Elementor Pro: Automatically tracks form submissions and identify visitors
  • Contact Form 7: Automatically tracks form submissions and identify visitors

Credits

This plugin is created by journy.io.

What’s Next

Please stay tuned as we’ll be bringing visitor profiling to your wordpress site/store soon!

Notes

No notes
sections.installation:
1. Install journy.io by uploading the journy-io directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory. (See instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.)
  2. Activate journy.io through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Set up API key by going to the Settings > journy.io menu.
sections.faq:
Can we use journy.io WITHOUT making an account first?

Unfortunately not, because of the many great features, some based on AI and statistical data-driven attribution, we have to use our own dedicated platform. But it’s free, so it’s not that bad!
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • Remove WooCommerce support – redo later –
  • Add support for journy.io v2
  • Add support for elementor form actions

1.0.49

  • Set default to production and change plugin version in code

1.0.40

  • contact Form 7 events

1.0.30

  • Auto-detect Contact Form 7

1.0.20

  • WooCommerce events

1.0.10

  • Auto-detect WooCommerce

1.0

  • Initial version
